Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor: "I want to win it all. And ours will be a team that will forever be remembered."
Brandon Nimmo: "This has been a long time coming. We wanted it so bad for our fan base."
Steve Cohen: "I want to slay the negative Met fan perceptions, and we're on our way to doing that."
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets reached the National League Championship Series
The Mets finished off the rival Phillies in Game 4 of their best-of-five Division Series
The Mets won 3-1 to wrap up a postseason series at home for the first time in 24 years
Others: The series was tied 2-2 before the Mets won Game 4
The Mets will play the San Diego Padres or Los Angeles Dodgers in the National League Championship Series
